item.description:
Please RSVP!

Interactive Market Discussion

We will harness the intellectual horsepower of our members to figure out where the market and the economy are going in light of cans being kicked down the road and the presentation last week by Nariman Behravesh.

Trading strategies for QE3 (Quantitative Easing) in 2013 & 2014 by Rondeau Flynn
Fellow Investor/Trader Rondeau Flynn with cover the basics of how to properly enter the market with low risk, and how to benefit from the Federal Reserve's continued purchasing program. He will cover the major index's, and show how basic risk controls can put you at an advantage with the market. This talk will feature an interactive discussion featuring both short & long term trading/investing.

 

If you have a friend you talk stocks with, bring them with you!

Food or drinks are not allowed in any MIT meeting room.

We strongly urge each person to make his or her own decisions about investing their money. Investment ideas and recommendations made during our meetings and in our online dialogs bear no liability by anyone.

This is a free and open meeting. No membership is required, but please RSVP.
item.name: Boston Investor's Group Wednesday Meetup
